nodes.text: Kellic was an individual who was the companion and mentor of Rak Jaren.

Kellic was to have appeared in the cancelled LucasArts video game Star Wars: 1313, before the protagonist was changed from Rak Jaren to Boba Fett. This information was confirmed by tweets from Matt Boland, who credited 1313 Creative Director Dominic Robilliard with the information.
